title: Compact Farms - 15 Proven Plans for Market Farms (2017) Gooner
description:
Compact Farms - 15 Proven Plans for Market Farms on 5 Acres or Less (2017) (Epub) Gooner

Publisher: Storey Publishing LLC (7 Feb. 2017)
Author: Josh Volk
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1612125948
ISBN-13: 9781612125947
ASIN: B01N0QY6EN

Small is beautiful, and these 15 real farm plans show that small-scale farmers can have big-time success. Compact Farms is an illustrated guide for anyone dreaming of starting, expanding, or perfecting a profitable farming enterprise on five acres or less. 

The farm plans explain how to harness an area’s water supply, orientation, and geography in order to maximize efficiency and productivity while minimizing effort. Profiles of well-known farmers such as Eliot Coleman and Jean-Martin Fortier show that farming on a small scale in any region, in both urban and rural settings, can provide enough income to turn the endeavor from hobby to career. These real-life plans and down-and-dirty advice will equip you with everything you need to actually realize your farm dreams
